Whats changed: 
1. Added ipv6 support
2. Added curl build definitions: 
  CURL_DISABLE_FTP
  CURL_DISABLE_LDAP
  CURL_DISABLE_LDAPS
  CURL_DISABLE_TELNET
  CURL_DISABLE_DICT
  CURL_DISABLE_FILE
  CURL_DISABLE_TFTP
  CURL_DISABLE_RTSP
  CURL_DISABLE_POP3
  CURL_DISABLE_IMAP
  CURL_DISABLE_SMTP
  CURL_DISABLE_GOPHER
